mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_group ( ID, PGROUPID, GROUPNUM, GROUPNAME, GROUPTYPE, BACKUP_STATU, BACKUP_TIME, BACKUP_REASON, CREATOR, CREATENAME, CREATETIME, DEPARMENTCODE, DEPARMENTNAME, LASTUPDATETIME, JMGID, DELETEFLAG ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pgroupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grouptype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backupStatu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backupTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{backupReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deparmentcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deparmentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jmgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO t_group ( ID, PGROUPID, GROUPNUM, GROUPNAME, GROUPTYPE, BACKUP_STATU, BACKUP_TIME, BACKUP_REASON, CREATOR, CREATENAME, CREATETIME, DEPARMENTCODE, DEPARMENTNAME, LASTUPDATETIME, JMGID, DELETEFLAG )
select #{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pgroupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.groupnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.groupname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.grouptype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.backupStatu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.backupTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.backupReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.deparmentcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.deparmentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.jmgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.deleteflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_group
PGROUPID = #{pgroupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUPNUM = #{groupnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUPNAME = #{groupname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUPTYPE = #{grouptype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BACKUP_STATU = #{backupStatu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BACKUP_TIME = #{backupTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BACKUP_REASON = #{backupReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATENAME = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DEPARMENTCODE = #{deparmentcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPARMENTNAME = #{deparmentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LASTUPDATETIME = #{lastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
JMGID = #{jmgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETEFLAG = #{deleteflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_group WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rownum = 1

select (select count(1) from T_AJGROUP t1 where t1.groupid=g.id and t1.deleteFlag=0) as caseNum, (select count(1) from T_USERGROUP t2 where t2.groupid=g.id and t2.deleteFlag=0) as memberNum, g.creator, g.createName, g.id, g.GROUPNUM, g.GROUPNAME, g.GROUPTYPE, g.CREATETIME, g.BACKUP_STATU, g.BACKUP_TIME, g.JMGID from T_GROUP g where g.deleteFlag=0 and g.pgroupid=#{pgroupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND exists(SELECT 1 FROM T_USERGROUP WHERE GROUPID=g.ID AND USERNAME LIKE '%'||#{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' escape '\')

SELECT * FROM T_GROUP t WHERE t.DELETEFLAG=0 AND t.ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT ug.GROUPID FROM T_USERGROUP ug WHERE ug.DELETEFLAG=0 AND ug.USERID=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND t.GROUPNAME LIKE '%'||#{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' escape '\'
SELECT , (SELECT d.DICT_VALUE1 FROM SYS_DICT d WHERE d.dict_key=t.GROUPTYPE AND d.PARENT_KEY='24') as GROUPTYPENAME FROM t_group t WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rownum = 1
